#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int b10(int n, int m)
{
	if(m==10)
	return n;
	
	int i = 0, temp, ans = 0;
	while (n > 0)
	{
		temp = n % 10;
		ans += temp * pow(m, i);
		n /= 10;
		i++;
	}
	return ans;
}

int main(void)
{
	int T, N1, N2, base, temp;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d", &N1, &N2);

		temp = N1;
		base = 0;
		while (temp > 0)
		{
			if (temp % 10 > base)
				base = temp % 10;

			temp /= 10;
		}

		N1 = b10(N1, base + 1);

		temp = N2;
		base = 0;
		while (temp > 0)
		{
			if (temp % 10 > base)
				base = temp % 10;

			temp /= 10;
		}
		N2 = b10(N2, base + 1);

		printf("%d\n", N1 + N2);
	}

	return 0;
}
